Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Everywhere \Ev"er*y*where`\, adv. In every place; in all places; hence, in every part; thoroughly; altogether. [1913 Webster]

everywhere adv : to or in any or all places; "You find fast food stores everywhere"; "people everywhere are becoming aware of the problem"; "he carried a gun everywhere he went"; "looked all over for a suitable gift"; (`everyplace' is used informally for `everywhere') [syn: {everyplace}, {all over}]
